head.title: Spend your Easter break in a holiday home
head.description: Spend an unforgettable Easter break in a cosy Interchalet holiday apartment or in a spacious villa with room for the whole family.

links.label: Book a holiday apartment for Easter

content.textLeft:
Enjoy some relaxation time at Easter

Whether it's only a few days or an extended holiday over Easter - enjoy Easter and the arrival of Spring in your own holiday house. Colourful fields of flowers, the warming rays of spring sunshine and a cosy, good value holiday apartment or a spacious holiday house for the whole family - what more do you need for proper relaxation?

>> Lots of attractive destinations
content.textRight:
Spend your family holiday in self-catering accommodation

Do you prefer a long walk through stunning mountain scenery or is winter when you start looking forward to your next holiday by the sea? Would you like to surprise your partner with a romantic stay in a holiday apartment? Or is Easter when you are looking to have an adventure-filled family holiday in a spacious villa or cottage? Irrespective of where you’d most like to spend your Easter holiday and the people you’d like to spend it with, you’ll find the right accommodation at excellent rates with Interchalet.

elements.ImgAlt: Holiday homes and cottages for holidays with dog:
elements.Title: Holidays with dog
All special offers for holiday homes

content.text:
Easter in Germany

Have you thought about spending the Easter holidays in Germany for a change? It’s a great idea as you’ll discover breathtaking landscapes and vibrant cities there. Be amazed by the blooming spring landscapes, have a refreshing swim in the North Sea or enjoy a challenging hike in the Black Forest. Regardless of the type of holiday you have in mind, you’re sure to find an idyllic location in this diverse country... And with Interchalet you’ll find the right holiday apartment for your needst. And those who prefer a bit more space can book an entire holiday house for the Easter holidays in Germany - that way you can make it really cosy.
Germany | North Sea | Black Forest

Easter in Holland

Spend Easter in Holland and enjoy the colourful streets of Amsterdam. Or relax in a holiday apartment by the North Sea. Be it Noord-Holland or Zuid-Holland: a trip to the Netherlands is always worthwhile. 
Holland | Amsterdam | Noord-Holland | Zuid-Holland

Easter in Italy

Be it Lake Garda, Tuscany or Venice: the unique culture, historical buildings and excellent food are just some of the reasons to be impressed by Italy. The perfect mix of relaxation and adventure!
Italy | Lake Garda | Adria/Veneto | Tuscany | Venice | Florence

An Easter break to France

Those who prefer to hunt for their Easter eggs in France can spend their Easter holiday on the picturesque Côte d'Azur. Those not wanting to travel that far can enjoy Brittany in the west of France and dive into the Atlantic for a refreshing spring swim. 
France | Côte d'Azur   

Easter holidays in Austria: hiking and wellness

The Easter holidays are perfect to visit the regions of Austria away from the crowds. Depending on the weather and your preferences, you can plan beautiful hiking trips, e.g in the Salzkammergut, Gasteinertal, Lungau, in Tyrol, Carinthia, Vorarlberg or Styria. Be enchanted by the blossoming spring landscapes and enjoy the culinary delights of the region. And after your hiking tour, you may enjoy the in-house sauna or spa offered in some of our holiday homes. No matter what kind of holidays you are looking for, in Austria you are sure to find a heavenly place to suit your taste ... and the perfect holiday apartment with Interchalet. And if you like it more spacious, you can also book one of the many holiday houses that we offer in Tyrol where you can make yourself comfortable and feel right at home.
Austria | Salzburg | Tyrol | Carinthia | Vorarlberg | Styria   

Easter holidays in Spain

¡Felices Pascuas! Spain offers some wonderful locations for your Easter break. Have a great time on an Easter trip to Mallorca. In mid-April you’ll generally be able to enjoy a dip in the sea in some lovely warm temperatures. Perfect for the kids to play around in, as well as for relaxing in secluded bays, hiking or for letting your hair down in the clubs along the beachfront. The Costa Blanca on Spain’s east coast is also a great place to spend the Easter holidays.
Spain | Mallorca | Costa Blanca   

City breaks in the Easter holidays

A city break to a fascinating big city is a great idea for all those who prefer to take their annual leave in summer but who would nevertheless like to get away for a couple of days over Easter. Spend your Easter holidays in Berlin, Paris, Rome or in another major city in Europe. With Interchalet, you’ll be able to find the right holiday accommodation for your stay.
Prague | Paris | Rome | Vienna

A last minute Easter break

Easter is getting ever closer and you still haven’t found any accommodation for your Easter holiday? Then take a look at our last minute offers. Those who book last minute can expect a discount of up to 33 percent on many holiday houses and apartments. So all those who book on the spur of the moment and want to get away with a friend/partner or with the whole family will be sure to find the right accommodation with Interchalet and even save some hard cash along the way!

content.headline: Safety in your holiday home!
content.key: Safe hand-over of the key on-site

elements.title: Good quality guaranteed!
elements.subtitle: Qualität steht bei uns an erster Stelle
elements.caption:
Our team visits the properties in-person.
Regular quality checks.
Detailed, honest descriptions of the accommodation.
Guaranteed authentic customer reviews.
Best rental prices for our customers!

elements.title: Personally there for you!
elements.subtitle: Profitieren Sie von unserer Erfahrung
elements.caption:
Competent & friendly staff in our in-house Service-Centre.
All questions regarding your accommodation and surrounding area, happily answered.
Only you can rate your accommodation after your holiday with us!

elements.title: 49 years of experience!
elements.subtitle: Freiheit und Unabhängigkeit in ihrem Ferienhaus
elements.caption:
You can count on us: More than 49 years of experience in the holiday home industry.
Approx. 40,000 holiday homes and apartments selected for you in Europe and Florida.

elements.title: Why Interchalet?
elements.caption:
A simple apartment or an exclusive villa with private pool. In the mountains and by the sea, in summer and winter. At Interchalet you will find the right accommodation for your dream holiday in a holiday home.
We currently have approx. 40.000 holiday houses and holiday apartments for your holidays!

elements.title: Spending time in a holiday home is the ideal solution for everyone!
elements.caption:
If you would like to enjoy a relaxing holiday as a couple or with family and friends, then you will love spending time in a holiday home or holiday apartment.
You can spend your holiday your way, in typical accommodation for your destination so you can quickly get familiar with the country and its people. An individual and unique holiday experience. Together we can find the ideal destination for your holiday based on your interests and preferences.
